name: 古瓊昇
objective:
數位訊號處理實習課程包含原理講述及如何在電腦上實作：
1. 信號與系統說明 (Signal and System)
2. Z 轉換 (Z-transfom)
3. 摺積 (convolution)
4. 取樣 (Sampling)
5. 離散傅立葉轉換 DFT (Discrete Fourier Transform)
6. 轉換 (Transform)
7. 濾波器架構 (Filter Structure)
8. 有限沖激響應濾波器 (FIR)
9. 無限沖激響應濾波器 (IIR)
10. Applications in adaptive noise cancellation, echo cancellation, system identification
11. Applications in Communications
Introduction to digital communications
Modulation and demodulation techniques
Digital filters in communication systems
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Digital Signal Processing and Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
Week 2-3: The Discrete-Time Fourier Analysis
Week 4-5: The Z-Transform
Week 6-7: The Discrete Fourier Transform
Week 8-9: Implementation of Discrete-Time Filters
Week 10-11: FIR Filter Design
Week 12-13: IIR Filter Design
Week 14-15: Sampling Rate Conversion
Week 16-17: Round-Off Effects in Digital Filters
Week 18: Applications in Adaptive Filtering and Communications
materials: Vinay K. Ingle , John G. Proakis, "Essentials of Digital Signal Processing Using MATLAB, 3/e," Cengage Learning, 2011
consultation: Office hour or making an appointment by email
